desc: Kid-friendly premium and travel yoga mat kits to get your child started in yoga and mindfulness for physical and emotional resilience. Discover our biodegradable, recyclable yoga mats collection with natural rubber and micro suede top.

layout.text:
Joining the Rainbow Gum Family means more than just owning a fantastic yoga mat.
At Rainbow Gum Yoga we aim to create beautifully designed yoga mats and accessories for kids for helping teach kids emotional resilience and regulation through the practice of yoga and mindfulness. We aim to empower parents, carers and teachers with an easy way to connect to and support their child’s mental and physical health.
Our Aussie animal family share their own stories to enable parents to deliver complex concepts in a simple and positive way that can be reinforced daily through everyday wellness practices and mindset-shifting mantras.
Our yoga mats are child friendly – they are high-quality and easy for children to use, carry and store, as well as caring for the environment our Rainbow Gum family lives in.
